ARTICLE.TITLE: Using Science to Guide Our Restart
ARTICLE.TEXT:
LEXINGTON, Ky. (Aug. 14, 2020) — University of Kentucky President Eli Capilouto shared a video message with the UK campus community this morning, saying UK's plan to restart campus — including a return to classes Monday — has been guided by best practices in science and health. He said the UK START team, composed of world-class clinicians, researchers and public health officials, has been meeting for months to help form a plan to return students to class, and UK will continue to look to this team for guidance as we move forward this semester.

Please watch Capilouto's message above.
